meanings.definition: The branch of biology that deals with the search for extraterrestrial life and the effects of extraterrestrial environments on living organisms.
meanings.sent1: Scientists in exobiology study the possibility of life on other planets.
meanings.sent2: Exobiology is an exciting field that explores life beyond Earth.
meanings.sent3: The exobiology conference had alien-themed decorations.
meanings.sent4: Her curiosity about exobiology was as vast as the universe itself.
meanings.sent5: The mysteries of exobiology captivate the imagination of many.
